Room.Name: Hillborough Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling along Hillborough Way, between two large centers.
Room.LongDescription: You are in the center of town where a number of small businesses have come together to try to sell you stuff. There are two large shopping centers on the north and south sides of the road. On the north, you can see the Hillborough Adamantine Works shop, and on the south, you can see the Might and Magic Mystery Shop.
